title: My Mister Ostrich - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adultery   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Coming of Age   Complex Family Relationships   Death of Loved Ones   Disabilities   Divorce   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Long Separations   Modern Day
author: Han Yan   含胭
description: Gu Mingxi and Pang Qian were next-door neighbors, classmates, and deskmates. From year-to-year, even when the class seating was rearranged, they would still be deskmates. They grew up together like a pair of brother and sisters despite having different parents; if it was someone else, then their parents would probably have already arranged their wedding. However, Gu Mingxi was different.>
